channel.title: announcements on pnijhara's blog
channel.description: Recent content in announcements on pnijhara's blog

item.title: Announcement
item.description:
Started this blogging website to summarize my learning weakly. However, due to some social issues and college work, I was not able to keep up the work. A list that I prepared for learning and writing was not followed by me. Though now I cannot summarize the whole semester learnings weakly, I decided to summarize them semester wise till now starting from my journey to college that is from 1st sem to 3rd sem. The three blog series will cover almost all the topics from starting my journey at Aligarh Muslim Unversity to me as a 3rd semester studying Electrical Engineering student, from technical learnings to life lessons, from hackathons to club etc.

Apart from that, I will be resuming my weakly writings from 2020. Hope that would be a great start.

Also, I have removed links of Instagram and facebook from this website as I am not continuing them. You can connect me on the mail or via twitter.
